name: TheGessingGame
description:
This game can be played by 2 to 6 players. 

Set up: The questions and answers must be set by someone who is not playing. 

Don't leave empty lines.

The game starts when the first player randomly chooses a square. The player have 20 seconds to answer the corresponding question and he can't answer more then one time.

- Correct answer = 1 point (click on the number next of his name). 

- Wrong answer = no points (click on Wrong button).

This will be repeated by each player in his turn, and when all squares are used, the player with the highest score wins the game.

                                                                                                Made by Dani Abou Daher
